author: rubys
msg: Remove obsolete restriction.  Thanks to Anil for pointing this out!

author: akv
msg: 1.0 is not appropriate because we will be going back from 2.2 which was in
We don't want Tomcat tied to the version numbers of any of the specifications
it implements - that rules out 1.1 and 2.2.
3.0 is the last stable release for 1999. Bug fixes updates to this release
will be of the form 3.0.[z]. Feature updates to this release will be of the
form 3.[y]. If we implement a newer version of the JSP or Servlet specs, then
we'll rev the major version number.

author: costin
msg: Added "package" target - to create a zip file for distribution.
